definition: bamboo or wooden spear/Kangxi radical 79, occurring in 段, 毅, 殺 etc

sentences.english: In addition, an ally within 5 squares of you can make a saving throw.
sentences.chinese: 另外，位處你5格內的一名友方可以投一次豁免骰。

sentences.english: Whenever you reroll, you must abide by the result of the second roll.
sentences.chinese: 每當你重擲時，你都必須接受第二次擲骰的結果。

sentences.english: JAGS Revised describes four types of rolls.
sentences.chinese: JAGS改進版描述了四種類型的投骰。

sentences.english: Fish-Prawn-Crab is a classics Chinese gambling game which should be plays with dice.
sentences.chinese: 魚蝦蟹，又稱魚蝦蟹骰寶，是賭博遊戲的一種。

sentences.english: But instead of rolling whatever dice you normally roll you'll roll 12-sided dice!
sentences.chinese: 不過不同於普通的投骰，你將投12面骰子。

sentences.english: You gain a bonus to the damage rolls of arcane powers equal to your Dexterity modifier.
sentences.chinese: 你對奧法威能的傷害骰獲得等同你的敏捷調整的加值。
他們因擲骰賭博而負債。

sentences.english: Now let's build an odds calculator for die rolls.
sentences.chinese: 現在讓我們構建一個擲骰機率計算器。

sentences.english: When you make an opposed check, both characters roll, and the higher check result wins.
sentences.chinese: 進行對抗檢定時兩個人都要投骰，數值較高的勝出。

definition: pai gow (gambling game played with dominoes)
lots (to be drawn)/lot (in a game of chance)
big/cup made of horn/horn wine container
a drum-shaped rattle (used by peddlers or as a toy)/rattle-drum
